original_title: ASPI crosses 14,000 points for first time ever
original_body_lines: The All Share Price Index (ASPI) of the Colombo Stock Exchange recorded a new all-time high today (12), surpassing the 14,000 mark for the first time in history.
Accordingly, the index has increased by 150.72 points to close at 14,035.81, a new all-time high.
Meanwhile, today’s total turnover was reported as Rs. 7.3 billion.
